long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Momo is free a simple chrome dictionary extension.

Just type or highlight the word you don't know and ta-da!

• Momo contains 12 languages with audio examples and multiple definitions!
• Very simple to use
